summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Woodlawn Avenue, from Ravenna Boulevard to East 73rd Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by the installation of a street lighting system; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7955 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
